content.webTitle: Best pictures of the day - live

fields.headline: Best pictures of the day - live
fields.bodyText: Tokue Hosokawa couldn't bear to leave his animals to starve on his farm after the nuclear disaster in Fukushima. Photographer Kazuma Obara has made a beautiful documentary of the breeder who stayed to care for his contaminated horses. See more images in our gallery. Our picture from the past today is a portrait of designer Edith Head who was born on this day in 1897. You can submit your photos of the UK storm to GuardianWitness Eyewitness: a hiker is rewarded with breathtaking views while crossing the Rotsteinpass, high above the village of Unterwasser in Switzerland.
